specialMovementDescription:
There are various types of special movement that allows you to move around more efficiently in certain circumstances. Special movement is accompanied by a number of meters in parentheses (X) that designates how many meters can be moved when spending 1 [MP].
  • Swim (X): Creatures with swim speed can easily navigate bodies of Water. Creatures with swim speed reduce the difficulty of Tests to navigate Water by 10.
  • Climb (X): Creatures with climb speed can easily scale vertical surfaces. Additionally creatures with Climb speed reduce the difficulty on climb Tests by 10.
  • Burrow (X): Creatures with Burrow speed can traverse through earth, sand or similar terrain.
  • Fly (X): Creatures with Fly speed are able to soar through the air, They need to at least spend 1 [MP] each turn to move in a direction or to hover in the air to prevent falling down. If they are falling they can stop their falling by spending 4 [MP] . Additionally if a flying creature is knocked prone they immediatly drop 5 meters and only stay prone if they hit the ground.
  • Hover (X): Creatures with Hover speed can also fly through the air but are a lot more flexible and donâ€™t have to spend [MP] to stay in the air and are not affected by being knocked prone.
